product_name: Brooks Versatile Sports Bra - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering full support without bulk or unnecessary weight, the Brooks Versatile sports bra stays snug and keeps you comfortable while running or doing other high-impact activities. Mesh inner liner, mesh straps and mesh panels wick moisture away from the skin, ensuring you stay dry and comfortable even when working up a sweat. Bra provides support with compression and encapsulation. The Brooks Versatile sports bra features reflective highlights that can be seen from any angle to enhance visibility when running at night. Closeout.
short_description: Offering full support without bulk or unnecessary weight, the Brooks Versatile sports bra stays snug and keeps you comfortable while running or doing other high-impact activities.
